backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing projects, user profiles, authorization, and blob storage with CRUD operations and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Machine‑generated feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A prewritten list of short summaries describing the purpose of major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: TailwindCSS base, components, and utilities setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, theme provider, global layout, and routing for projects and editor pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth gate that handles identity initialization, actor readiness, and profile setup before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their profile name on first use.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Shared layout component providing header, footer, and routed main content for the app.
frontend/src/features/editor/AudioEditor: Main editor page orchestrating backend readiness, project loading, audio engine state, and rendering upload, transport, EQ, separation, accompaniment, mixer, and export panels.
frontend/src/features/editor/components/: Panel for tempo analysis, tempo override, and generating AI-based accompaniment stems using audioEngine actions.
Handles audio file upload, validation, backend upload, and loading into the audio engine with drag-and-drop and progress support.
Provides UI controls to enable, adjust, and reset multiband EQ settings tied to audioEngine state.
Allows exporting the mixed audio or individual stems by rendering buffers and triggering downloads.
Mixer interface for adjusting stem volume, mute, and solo states for all stems managed by the audio engine.
Controls stem separation workflow including starting separation, showing progress, errors, and completion status.
UI component providing play/pause, seeking, time display, and volume controls tied to the AudioEngine.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useAu: Main audio engine hook managing file loading, playback state, stems, EQ, tempo analysis, and accompaniment generation.
Manages playback state, current time tracking, seeking, and duration for the audio transport.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useEq: Provides EQ state, filter initialization, band adjustments, and EQ reset logic.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useSt: Manages stem list with controls for volume, mute, solo, and clearing generated stems.
Handles asynchronous stem separation simulation with progress, error handling, and reset.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useTe: Runs tempo estimation on an AudioBuffer and tracks analysis state and errors.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/accom: Generates synthetic drum, bass, and guitar accompaniment tracks offline using Web Audio.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/audio: Validates audio files by extension, MIME type, and size limits.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/downl: Encodes an AudioBuffer as WAV and triggers a browser download.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/offli: Offline-renders mixed audio or stems with optional EQ using Web Audio OfflineAudioContext.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/tempo: Estimates BPM from an AudioBuffer using downsampling, energy envelope analysis, peak detection, and interval mode calculation.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/wavEn: Encodes an AudioBuffer into a WAV Blob by interleaving channels and writing PCM headers and samples.
frontend/src/features/projects/component: Provides dialogs for creating new projects, validating input, and handling backend readiness and errors.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectsP: Displays the user's projects, handles backend readiness states, and provides UI for viewing and creating projects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorConnection.ts: Manages resilient backend actor creation with explicit loading/error states and optional retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Derives a simplified backend readiness state from actor connection status with user‑facing messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, projects, and project files through an actor connection.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme color variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Provides functions to parse backend errors into user-friendly messages and format them for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, known issues, and architectural notes for the audio editing app.
